org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.activity

Class TranslationSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.activity.TranslationSettings

  • public class TranslationSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for storing translating settings for activity export.
    The bean is created in AuthRequestFilter and stored in request.
